full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/14/2023 AFFIDAVIT OF BIRTH I, Sohan Singh Cheema, presently residing at 874 Carolina Avenue, Yuba City, California 95991, first being duly sworn depose and declare as follows: That I am a permanent resident of the United States of America. My Alien Registration Number is FOIA (b)(6) That I was born on September 9, 1929 in Village Cheema Kalan, District Jalandhar, Punjab, India. That I am formerly of Village Cheema Kalan, District Jalandhar, Punjab, India. That this affidavit is prepared in reference to Tara Singh Dhesi, presently residing at 951 Railroad Avenue, Yuba City, California 95991. That I personally know Kartar Singh and his wife Karam Kaur of Village Dhesian Kahna, District Jalandhar, Punjab, India. That Tara Singh Dhesi was born from the wedlock of Kartar Singh and his wife Karam Kaur on September 13, 1948 in Village Mothada Kalan, District Jalandhar, Punjab, India. That Kartar Singh's family and my family used to visit each other often during special occasions such as birthdays, weddings, anniversaries, and religious ceremonies. That if any further information is required, please feel free to contact me. That I further affirm the knowledge that swearing to any false statements while under oath constitutes the crimes of perjury. Sohan S chuma Sohan Singh Cheema SUBSCRIBED AND SWORN TO BEFORE ME THIS 10TH DAY OF August 1990 Kulwast NOTARY PUBLIC, S. Jode CALIFORNIA OFFICIAL SEAL KULWANT S. JOHL NOTARY PUBLIC - CALIFORNIA SUTTER COUNTY My Comm. Expires June 18, 1993
